title: Modes of winding up.
content: 203.- (1) The winding up of a company may be either- (a) by the Court; or (b) voluntary ; or (c) subject to the supervision of the Court. (2) The provisions of this Law with respect to winding up apply, unless the contrary appears, to the winding up of a company in any of those modes. Contributories Liability as contributories of present and past members.
